content.raw: There is not full working version at this moment since Melodic lacks of some dependencies: [https://github.com/ros-simulation/gazebo\_ros\_pkgs/issues/696#issuecomment-379786528](https://github.com/ros-simulation/gazebo_ros_pkgs/issues/696#issuecomment-379786528) . Better do not merge until we can run a successful run to avoid failing mails.
